urlWebsite.description: url to the website of the wallet with more information

logo.description: url to the logo of the wallet

company.description: name of the company. In case it's a community project, the name of the community

companyUrl.description: url to the company, not the url to the product

contact.description: provide a link to a contact formular or insert an email address for support requests

downloadSource.description: if the wallet is open source, provide the url to the source code, like a github link

license.description: add the license of the wallet. In case you have multiple licences, add them here.

holderCapability.description: is the wallet capable of the holder role

issuerCapability.description: is the wallet capable of the issuer role

verifierCapability.description: is the wallet capable of the verifier role

type.description: it is a cloud or mobile wallet

portability.description: am I able to export my data from the wallet/agent and import them into another device/system

urlAppStore.description: link to the app store from apple

urlGooglePlayStore.description: link to the play store from google

urlWebApp.description: link to the web app in case it's not a mobile wallet

profiles.description: which profiles from the credential profile comparison SIG are supported
